name: Letter Gravity
description:
Take control of Wordman and collect gold letters before the Red Wizard creates a critical mass and ends the universe!

Controls

  • A/D or left/right arrow to move left and right around the circle

Why, What?

Created in 17 hours over 14 days as part of the Miziziziz's Chain Letter Jam around looking after a family, illness and a full time job. I was nominated by Yannick. My first ever Game Jam! Thank you... I think!

Check out my YouTube Channel with my progress on my Co-Op Pipe Laying Exploration game Clomper. I will do a dev log covering the creation of Letter Gravity but I'm shattered right now and racing to the finish.

The other games in the chain:

  1. Miziziziz's Word Man Saves The Day
  2. Vimlark
  3. Zyger's Comic Sans
  4. Yannick's Augmented Letters

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 60 second in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).
